fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to heal a player. If you successfully protect them, gain a charge of Devastate. You can heal yourself one time.
- Devastate: Deal a basic attack to a player. Can be done multiple times in one night if there are enough charges to do so.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you gain a target. Your target will not be evil.
- If your target dies, your goal becomes "be the last one standing" and you gain 2 charges of Devastate each night.
- If your target dies, they can win if you win.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See your target live to the end of the game or be the last one standing.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
